video.title: Atelier
video.synopsis: A young "fabric geek" lands a job at an upscale Japanese lingerie company -- and quickly discovers she'll need help to survive.

episodes.synopsis: Mayuko steps into a curious new world: the lingerie industry. On her first day of work the office is busy with an upcoming floor show.
episodes.title: Lingerie 101

episodes.synopsis: The atelier's owner, Nanjo, teaches Mayuko about brand strategy. Mayuko helps her first customer and finds she has much more to learn about lingerie.
episodes.title: You Are What You Wear

episodes.synopsis: Nanjo pushes Mayuko to decide whether she wants in or out of the lingerie industry. A life-changing experience helps Mayuko grapple with the decision.
episodes.title: A Brand New Challenge

episodes.synopsis: President Nanjo wants to expand into big department stores. Preserving the brand while growing fast creates many issues for a small business to solve.
episodes.title: A Change of Pace

episodes.synopsis: Sometimes you have to take risks to make a company grow. Mayuko is learning how to take chances while finding her place in the company.
episodes.title: Making My Mark

episodes.synopsis: You can't sell products and build a strong brand without a bold advertising strategy. Mayuko volunteers so she can learn, but finds it perplexing.
episodes.title: Marketing Matters

episodes.synopsis: Mayuko plans an ambitious runway show -- which she wants to rival those of the top designers -- but no one is sure how it will turn out.
episodes.title: Race to the Top

episodes.synopsis: Emotion is holding its first runway show ever. It’s an experience that goes beyond what the staff could have imagined. An incident occurs.
episodes.title: The Runway

episodes.synopsis: With the big show finished and Emotion transitioning, Mayuko begins to think about her own future. What is lingerie to her? Where is Emotion headed?
episodes.title: What's Next?

episodes.synopsis: Mayuko creates the ideal lingerie. Nanjo visits the old site of a lingerie maker from her thwarted past. Emotion's founding secret is revealed.
episodes.title: The Past is Present

episodes.synopsis: The employees are all worried about work even though they are on extended leave. Mayuko begins to actually create the lingerie she wants to make.
episodes.title: When the Cat's Away

episodes.synopsis: The runway show is a success, and Emotion receives more attention from the fashion industry, which in turn brings the new request Mayuko has been longing for.
episodes.title: Opportunity Knocks

episodes.synopsis: Emotion preps for a new runway show themed "elegance," but it unfolds like a memoir of Nanjo's past. Mayuko learns about Nanjo's true intentions.
episodes.title: Out in the Open
